ygData.subject: Re: Stupid Moron Spellcasters (Rated R)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, Lovely language. Must have never died before? If that s the case, you must have had good casters to kill the critter quickly before it killed you.
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, Lovely language. Must have never died before?
If that's the case, you must have had good casters
to kill the critter quickly before it killed you.
<br>First off, sounds like none of you had a plan for that
situation (read: asking for it), and second, why you tanks
thought that you should split up your critters and kill
them quicker is beyond me.<br>Hey, you know what
happens when someone runs up and attacks a critter that
is whacking an unconcious tank? The critter kills
the tank, and THEN turns to kill you. NO ONE COULD
HAVE PULLED THE BAT OFF OF YOU! Short of killing it
outright.<br><br>How long have you been playing??
